userStory.what: I want to have a dedicated page for each class to learn more about the offering The following information must be shown: Logo, title, Trainers, location, possibly a map view, datetime, skill level, registrations remaining, link to register for class. The URL path should be SEO friendly /training/training-title
userStory.why: so that I can choose the right class, AND the Trainer can tweet and promote their class.

question.descricao: Does the user story implementation involve any sensitive transactions, data, or API?
Does the user story implementation involve using any sensitive data or API ?

requirements.descricao: Verify that all sensitive data created and processed by the application has been identified, and ensure that a policy is in place on how to deal with sensitive data. ([C8](https://owasp.org/www-project-proactive-controls/#div-numbering))
Verify that sensitive data is sent to the server in the HTTP message body or headers, and that query string parameters from any HTTP verb do not contain sensitive data.
